contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 1891 D Swansea Contest
Swansea Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
swansea-contest
None
Cricket Field, Swansea The contest was abandoned after Ferndale and the 1st Glamorgan objected to the 3rd Glamorgan competing, as they were not members of the Association and had some professional players. The dispute could not be resolved and the two complaining bands marched off playing "The Bogie Man"
Feb. 6, 2013, 1:46 p.m. Aug. 18, 2016, 8:56 a.m.
Unknown Result 3rd Glamorgan Rifles (Swansea) H. W. Davies
Unknown Result Ferndale W. R. Howe
Unknown Result Glamorgan Artillery George Hannay
